name: h3
description: The Chandler AP5A Zombie Maple Wood Bat is a top-tier choice for serious baseball players, inspired by the iconic Albert Pujols AP5 model. Renowned for its larger barrel and pinched transition, this bat enhances whip through the zone, offering a perfect blend of balance and power for contact and power hitters alike. Its distinctive design features a glossy black finish with blood splatter and barbed wire graphics, complemented by a unique logo that adds flair. With a flared knob, medium handle, and large barrel, this bat ensures an optimal hitting surface, while the ink dot certification and XP finish guarantee pro-grade durability and double the hardness for an unrivaled swing feel. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 60 Days is included.
